title: Council Decision of 22 April 1996 appointing a member and three alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 22 April 1996 appointing a member and three alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners (96/C 136/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Ms Emilia SÁNCHEZ CHAMORRO is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Mr Luis Vicente CABEZA FERRER for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.

Mr Federico Simon SALAZAR is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Ms Emilia SÁNCHEZ CHAMORRO for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.

Ms Jacqueline LEMANT is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Mr Jacques PERRET for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.

Dr Raoul DEIBENER is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Dr Joséphine HERODE-CONRAD for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 22 April 1996.
For the Council
The President
W. LUCHETTI
(1) OJ No L 233, 24. 8. 1978, p. 15.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 5.
